item.title: WATCH: NASA's SpaceX Crew-11 has launched to the International Space Station
item.description: The American-Japanese-Russian crew of four rocketed from NASA’s Kennedy Space Center. They’ll replace colleagues who launched to the space station in ...

item.title: 4 dead in shooting at Montana bar, suspect at large: Highway patrol
item.description: Four people were killed in a shooting at a bar in Anaconda in western Montana, according to the Montana Highway Patrol.

item.title: WATCH: Flight attendants in Alaska Airlines door plug incident sue Boeing
item.description: Four flight attendants who were onboard Alaska Airlines Flight 1282, where the door plug blew out in January 2024, are now suing Boeing.

item.title: Stocks close lower after Trump's new tariffs, weak jobs report
item.description: A jobs report on Friday showed a major slowdown of hiring in recent months.

item.title: Trump fires BLS commissioner after weak jobs report
item.description: Fresh jobs data showed a major slowdown of hiring in recent months.
